thread.title: Watch: Judi Dench Interrogates Daisy Ridley About 'The Last Jedi' Spoilers
thread.title_full: Watch: Judi Dench Interrogates Daisy Ridley About 'The Last Jedi' Spoilers

author: gavia@dailydot.com (Gavia Baker-Whitelaw)
title: Watch: Judi Dench Interrogates Daisy Ridley About 'The Last Jedi' Spoilers
text:
BTW Daisy Ridley just can't escape Star Wars spoiler questions, even when she's busy filming other movies.
Ridley is working on Murder on the Orient Express at the moment, and her co-star Josh Gad recently posted a video of himself hopelessly demanding The Last Jedi spoilers from a stony-faced Ridley. Now he's back with a second video, this time enlisting the help of Judi Dench . A video posted by Josh Gad (@joshgad) on Feb 8, 2017 at 6:04am PST Yes, that's right. You just heard 82-year-old British cinema icon Dame Judi Dench utter the phrase, "What's the deal with Reylo?"
What's the deal, indeed?
